de.awi.floenavigation.sample_measurement

Class SampleMeasurementActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • de.awi.floenavigation.sample_measurement.SampleMeasurementActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class SampleMeasurementActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    SampleMeasurementActivity can be used to take sample or measurement on the sea ice. The devices are available on the view in the form of a drop down list with advanced search feature. This class handles sample/measurement selection, device selection, subsequent data is automatically populated, ais and gps status icon updates, view samples feature.

      • actionBarUpdatesFunction

        private void actionBarUpdatesFunction()
        Registers BroadcastReceivers for gps location and ais packet status updates. Handler statusHandler to run the runnable, which takes care of changing the color of the icons based on the received values from the broadcast receivers

        private boolean getOriginCoordinates()
